books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: The 21st book in the Mitch Rapp series. President Cook, a team of assassins and a killer known as Legion confront Rapp on different fronts.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: OATH OF LOYALTY

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A high school kid inherits a shed that is a portal to another world where good and evil are at war.
books.name: FAIRY TALE

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Alaina Urquhart
books.description: A forensic pathologist is on the trail of a serial killer in the Louisiana bayou.
books.name: THE BUTCHER AND THE WREN

books.author: by James Patterson and Brendan DuBois
books.description: President Keegan Barrett’s power grab tests the loyalties of two C.I.A. agents.
books.name: BLOWBACK

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Tamsyn Muir
books.description: Six months after waking up in a stranger’s body, Nona is torn between living an ordinary life or saving those around her from strange forces.
books.name: NONA THE NINTH

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Is Ben using his relationship with Fallon as fodder for his novel?
books.name: NOVEMBER 9

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: Set 300 years before the events of “A Game of Thrones,” this is the first volume of the two-part history of the Targaryens in Westeros.
books.name: FIRE AND BLOOD

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Quinn and Graham’s marriage depends on past promises.
books.name: ALL YOUR PERFECTS

books.author: by Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The fifth book in the Court of Thorns and Roses series. Nesta Archeron is forced into close quarters with a warrior named Cassian.
books.name: A COURT OF SILVER FLAMES
